short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension developed for an academic study. To sign up, please register on Prolific.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension has been built to support a user study being conducted at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. The study aims to measure changes in engagement of regular TikTok users in response to modifications in their For You Page. To sign up, please register on Prolific.
